General.Name: Shan Dong Dong-E E-Jiao Co Ltd
General.Description: Dong-E-E-Jiao Co.,Ltd. produces and sells Chinese medicine, health care products, and biological drugs in China. It offers compound donkey-hide gelatin paste, Enwei compound Ejiao pulp, donkey-hide gelatin jujube, Ejiao Buxue granules, and collagen powders. Dong-E-E-Jiao Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1952 and is based in Liaocheng, China.
